title: Research and import simple test programs from GHC's testsuite
body:
Research GHC's testsuite structure and import simple, reusable test programs.

**Deliverables:**
- Document GHC testsuite structure and licensing (can we reuse tests?)
- Identify 20-30 simple Haskell programs from GHC's testsuite that exercise basic features: arithmetic, pattern matching, ADTs, type classes, IO
- Import them into `tests/golden/` and `tests/e2e/` with appropriate expected outputs
- Note which tests require features we haven't implemented yet (tag them as `skip` or `xfail`)

**Design notes:**
- GHC testsuite lives at https://gitlab.haskell.org/ghc/ghc/-/tree/master/testsuite
- Focus on `tests/` subdirectories like `typecheck/should_compile`, `codeGen/should_run`
- Respect licensing (GHC is BSD-3-Clause)
